fields.title: Python Developer
Python developer (middle)
fields.description:
DATAS Technology — an international company specializing in providing comprehensive IT services, software development and system integration to the clients from private and public segments, especially to the financial institutions, large companies and holdings.

REQUIREMENTS:

3+ years of hands-on development experience
Experience developing data-oriented products using Python
Experience in data processing FW such as: Spark, Pandas, Hadoop, Airflow
Experience in Distributed Databases Such as: Elasticsearch, Mongo, Redis, etc'
Experience with developing microservices based architecture
Experience working in container-based environments using tools such as: K8s, helm
Experience working as a software developer in an Agile environment
Ability to perform well under pressure and tight schedules
Fluent English
Nice to have:

Experience in machine learning FWs such as: SKLearn, Tensorflow
Experience with RedHat OpenShift
Advanced Dev Environment knowledge: Maven, GIT, Jenkins, Docker
Experience in CI tools such as Jenkins
THE COMPANY OFFERS:

Work in an international company
Stable and competitive salary
Interesting tasks and projects using new technologies
Opportunities for professional and career development
Comfortable conditions, friendly, friendly staff
Medical insurance
Office in the center of Kyiv metro University, near the Circus

fields.title: JavaScript, Node.js Developer (Cyber Security Solution)
Android Developer (Java SE)
fields.description:
We are looking for an experienced Android Developer.
Together with your colleagues you will optimize the user experience on mobile devices and Set Top Boxes for more than 100 million users.

Main responsibilities

You will

write well-designed, testable, efficient code
integrate software components into a fully functional software system
document and maintain software functionality
troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing systems
Requirements

You need:

Experience with
remote data via REST and JSON
Android Set Top Box development
content Provider implementation
Knowledge in UI/UX and working with designers
Fluent English
Any of those will increase your chances

Certification (s) in relevant fields
Background in Java/JEE
Working experience with
third party libraries like: Butterknife, Retrofit, Dagger 2, Picasso, Volley
data persistence
different types of Android Services
Agile Development
Android Studio+ Gradle
You get

the opportunity to grow and develop alongside us and work in a dynamic, stable environment
to work in cross-functional teams with a lot of heart and brains
to be a member of the #LearningOrganization and to develop into the professional you look up to now
About us — #WeAre3SS

We are passionate about what we create and about the people with whom we work.
We believe in transparency, integrity, and fair play.
We actively share knowledge with our colleagues — we expect you to pitch in and do the same.
We work smart … and party hard!
